document_data.name: Takt Muren
document_data.mainbody: The '''Takt Muren''' was a small river found in both the [[Hordelands]] and [[Shou Lung]].
document_data.Geography: The Takt Muren flowed slightly northeast from [[Nor Takt]] for several hundred miles within the far northern reaches of the [[Katakoro Plateau]]. It cascaded over the [[Yellow Serpent Border Cliffs]] at the [[Yellow Thunder Falls]].
document_data.Description: The water filling the Takt Muren began as glacial runoff from the [[Katakoro Glacier]], filling first [[Nor Zanskra]] and then Nor Takt before joining the river and ultimately combining with the [[Ch'ing Tung River]] in Shou Lung.
